entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
